Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the CellName.

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

GetAtt.Description: The readiness scope for the cell, which can be the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a cell or the ARN of a recovery group.  Although this is a list, it can currently have only one element.
